label: histology and immunophenotyping/genetic
description: Positive histology PLUS - positive immunophenotyping AND/OR positive genetic studies (Used only for hematopoietic and lymphoid neoplasms M-9590/3-9992/3)

label: microscopic, NOS
description: Positive microscopic confirmation, method not specified

label: imaging
description: Radiography and/or other imaging techniques without microscopic confirmation
